Section.Paragraph: The representation of lexical entries requires special means which basic PATR systems do not include. The language DATR, however, can be used to define an inheritance network serving as the lexical component. The integration of such a module into an existing PATR system leads to various problems which are discussed together with possible solutions in this paper.
